question: Which campaign will be launched by Central Government to promote development and cleanliness in rural areas?
explanation: The Central Government will launch a 15-day \'Gram Samridhi Evam Swachhta\' campaign to promote development and cleanliness in rural areas on the 1st of October in partnership with state governments. The campaign will focus on educating villagers about hygiene and cleanliness through self-help groups, anganwadi centres and schools, and conducting training programmes.
